revised_title: Unified Expression of Boundary Value Problems in Continuum Mechanics
tldr: The paper explores the common ground between continuum mechanics and mathematical programming, developing a unified expression for various boundary value problems in continuum mechanics. It focuses on the role of Legendre dual transformation and the systematic method of deriving reciprocal variational principles. The paper also discusses the relevance of optimization theory and its potential applications to boundary value problems in continuum mechanics.
